text:
Clean your room to earn a star.  

Soon, you do it without prompting.  

There is power in seeing progress.  

Apply this technique to your essential goals.  

Do it at home or at work.  

Start small and reward progress.  

We achieve more this way.  

Big, lofty goals can feel impossible.  

Positive reinforcement brings enjoyment.  

It increases satisfaction in the process.

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Starting small and rewarding progress leads to greater achievements and increased satisfaction compared to setting lofty goals.
